description:
My place is in  Meatpacking  NYC, West village and Chelsea u can't spect a better location  for young people in NYC  . You’ll love my place because of the comfy bed, the high ceilings, big windows ( 10 feeds high) and  views, and the coziness furnisher , its also very quiet since it looks at back from the building. My place is good for couples, Young people  and business travelers.

The place looks an old palace for the high ceilins, big windows and old and new, decorating and an beautiful private garden view.

No dorman , its first floor

I'll be available any time for help if You need.

Best place , best location , lots of good places to eat and shop., one block to Meat packing, disco and restaurants place.

u are betwin  to 2 subway stations 7  and 8 aves . 1, 2 ,3 , L , A, C , E., is two stops to Soho.
name: Big and luxury studio 14 street
review: Hector is a wonderful host who will go out of his way to make sure you have a wonderful stay. I would definitely stay at this location again in NYC.
